info.name: Snow Leopard tooltips
info.description:
This style changes the tooltips to closely mimic the look of the dock menus in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658
info.additionalInfo:
*** UPDATES ***

09-03-12: Added Firefox 15 support.
03-28-11: Fixed a bug in which two tooltips appear over a bookmark.
03-22-11: Fixed a bug in which the tooltips would not display correctly in FF4.
02-21-10: Appearance revamp: the background now exactly matches the Snow Leopard menus.
01-14-10: Updated menu appearance with transparent borders.
10-14-09: Slightly decreased rounding.
